name: Tower and Guardian
summary:
This is a relaxed, casual tower defense game, simplifying the conventional tower defense game play, the player just put the location of the tower can be defensive
In different levels of terrain, you need to use their own full attention to the distribution of the rare defense tower. Play is very suitable for those who have the risk and challenge the heart of the players.
The game developers are independent game enthusiasts, there are many new people, so the game is still in the Beta stage, the level is relatively small
And the content is relatively simple. Hope that the players can understand.

With the war horn, pick up your sword, come together to meet the challenge!
